1. Playlists

Playlists

The Playlists page lists all of the playlists that have been created.

View playlist details
  1. Click on a playlist name to open the Playlist Details page.
Search videos

To search for a series, season, episode or movie, enter search terms and press enter.

The following video fields will be searched:

  • Video id
  • Name
  • Short description
  • Long description
  • Tags
  • Reference id
  • Custom fields
Details
Create a series
  1. Click .
  2. Enter a Name for the Series.
  3. Click Save.
Details
Create a folder
  1. Click .
  2. Enter a name for the folder.
  3. Press enter.
Add a video to a folder

Select one or more videos and then click More > Move to Folder.

Create a playlist

Manual Playlists can be created to group a series of videos where you control the order of playback.

Click in the left navigation.

Show me how
Details

Smart Playlists can be created to automatically group a series of videos based upon video tag.

Click in the left navigation.
